items.text: To the chief Musician upon Shoshannim-Eduth, A Psalm of Asaph.
items.plainText: To the chief Musician upon Shoshannim-Eduth, A Psalm of Asaph.

items.text: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel, thou that leadest Joseph like a flock; thou that dwellest between the cherubims, shine forth.
items.plainText: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel, thou that leadest Joseph like a flock; thou that dwellest between the cherubims, shine forth.

items.text: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength, and come and save us.
items.plainText: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength, and come and save us.

items.text: Turn us again, O God, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
items.plainText: Turn us again, O God, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.

items.text: O LORD God of hosts, how long wilt thou be angry against the prayer of thy people?
items.plainText: O LORD God of hosts, how long wilt thou be angry against the prayer of thy people?

items.text: Thou feedest them with the bread of tears; and givest them tears to drink in great measure.
items.plainText: Thou feedest them with the bread of tears; and givest them tears to drink in great measure.

items.text: Thou makest us a strife unto our neighbours: and our enemies laugh among themselves.
items.plainText: Thou makest us a strife unto our neighbours: and our enemies laugh among themselves.

items.text: Turn us again, O God of hosts, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
items.plainText: Turn us again, O God of hosts, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.

items.text: Thou hast brought a vine out of Egypt: thou hast cast out the heathen, and planted it.
items.plainText: Thou hast brought a vine out of Egypt: thou hast cast out the heathen, and planted it.

items.text: Thou preparedst room before it, and didst cause it to take deep root, and it filled the land.
items.plainText: Thou preparedst room before it, and didst cause it to take deep root, and it filled the land.

items.text: The hills were covered with the shadow of it, and the boughs thereof were like the goodly cedars.
items.plainText: The hills were covered with the shadow of it, and the boughs thereof were like the goodly cedars.

items.text: She sent out her boughs unto the sea, and her branches unto the river.
items.plainText: She sent out her boughs unto the sea, and her branches unto the river.

items.text: Why hast thou then broken down her hedges, so that all they which pass by the way do pluck her?
items.plainText: Why hast thou then broken down her hedges, so that all they which pass by the way do pluck her?

items.text: The boar out of the wood doth waste it, and the wild beast of the field doth devour it.
items.plainText: The boar out of the wood doth waste it, and the wild beast of the field doth devour it.

items.text: Return, we beseech thee, O God of hosts: look down from heaven, and behold, and visit this vine;
items.plainText: Return, we beseech thee, O God of hosts: look down from heaven, and behold, and visit this vine;

items.text: And the vineyard which thy right hand hath planted, and the branch that thou madest strong for thyself.
items.plainText: And the vineyard which thy right hand hath planted, and the branch that thou madest strong for thyself.

items.text: It is burned with fire, it is cut down: they perish at the rebuke of thy countenance.
items.plainText: It is burned with fire, it is cut down: they perish at the rebuke of thy countenance.

items.text: Let thy hand be upon the man of thy right hand, upon the son of man whom thou madest strong for thyself.
items.plainText: Let thy hand be upon the man of thy right hand, upon the son of man whom thou madest strong for thyself.

items.text: So will not we go back from thee: quicken us, and we will call upon thy name.
items.plainText: So will not we go back from thee: quicken us, and we will call upon thy name.

items.text: Turn us again, O LORD God of hosts, cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
items.plainText: Turn us again, O LORD God of hosts, cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
